FCCANALYSIS-PIN(1) fccanalysis-pin man page FCCANALYSIS-PIN(1)

NAME

fccanalysis-pin – pin version of the Key4hep stack

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis pin [-h | --help] [-c | --clear] [-f | --force] [-s | --show]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis-pin allows one to freeze the Key4hep stack version for the local copy of the FCCAnalyses. To create the "pin" first make sure that you have sourced Key4hep stack and after that simply run

fccanalysis pin


which will save the currently sourced stack into the pin.

In order to pin the analysis to any other stack source this stack first.

The information about the stack (if pin is active) is stored in file .fccana/stackpin inside the root of the FCCAnalyses.

OPTIONS

-h, --help
Prints short help message and exits.
-c, --clear
Clear current analysis pin (if active).
-f, --force
Force recreation of the analysis pin (can be used to overwrite the current pin).
-s, --show
Show current stack in the pin (if active).

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis(1)
